info.+content: Touken Ranbu: Hanamaru
刀剣乱舞-花丸-
action
comedy
fantasy
bishounen
time travel
TA

The year is 2205. The "historical revisionists" have begun attacks on the past in their plot to change history. The Saniwa, who have been charged with protecting history, can imbue life into objects. Strongest among these are the Tōken Danshi. The story centers around their cheerful lives.
"Hanamaru◎Biyori!" (花丸◎日和！; Hanamaru Weather) by Mitsuhiro Ichiki and Toshiki Masuda
#1: "Ake Kure Nikki" (明け暮れ日記) by Toshiki Masuda and Mitsuhiro Ichiki (ep 1)
#2: "Shinkon no Arika" (心魂の在処) by Yuuki Tai, Tarusuku Shingaki and Seiichirou Yamashita (ep 2)
#3: "Hana no Kaori wa Kyoushidare" (花の薫りは叶枝垂れ) by Seiichirou Yamashita, Daiki Yamashita, Kazutomi Yamamoto, Ryouta Asari, Yuuta Kasuya, Reona Irie and Yoshitaka Yamaya (ep 3)
#4: "Toki Zotomo Nashi Kenbi no Hana yo" (時ぞとも無し兼備の華よ) by Junya Enoki and Ryouhei Kimura (ep 4)
#5: "Izuru Tsuki, Shouen no Uta" (出づる月、招宴の唄) by Kousuke Toriumi, Kaito Ishikawa, Souma Saito and Takuya Satou (ep 5)
#6: "Okiraku Chin Douchu" (お気楽珍道中) by Kento Hama, Jun Oosuka, Tooru Sakurai and Kenji Hamada (ep 6)
#7: "Koi to Joudo no Yaezakura" (恋と浄土の八重桜) by AWT48 (ep 7)
#8: "Nikkari Ayakashi Kazoeuta" (にっかり妖かし数え唄) by Junji Majima (ep 8)
#9: "Akatsuki no Hoshi" (暁の星) by Daiki Yamashita and Eiji Miyashita (ep 9)
#10: "Kokorobase Kara Yukari Ari" (心馳こころばせから縁あり) by Ryouta Asari, Seiichirou Yamashita and Yuuichi Iguchi (ep 10)
"Itsu, Nan Toki mo" (いつ、何時も) by Toshiki Masuda and Mitsuhiro Ichiki (ep 12)
アニメ『刀剣乱舞-花丸-』 公式サイト

title.+content: Kisaragi: I have nothing I want to say...
Yayoi: I heard it was one ten-thousandths
Uzuki: I wonder what strength means
Minazuki: This citadel is truly blessed
Fumizuki: The happiness of thinking of someone
Nagatsuki: Because you have that past
Shiwasu: Our citadel is cheerful today too
